it.polimi.se2018.mvc.controller

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.controller.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stopper

    public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stopper
    This is the lobby of the match, which actually starts the game and handles events relative to the match, i.e. disconnections and reconnections

      • isMatchCreated

        public boolean isMatchCreated()
        Returns:
        true if the match has been created, i.e. the timer in Server has ran out and two or more players are connected

      • isMatchPlaying

        public boolean isMatchPlaying()
        Returns:
        true if all players chose their windows, or time has ran out
